meanings.definition: (Ghanaian Akan) beauty, excellence, fineness, goodness, handsomeness, niceness, pleasantness, quality, virtue, worth
meanings.english_definition: (Ghanaian Akan) beauty, excellence, fineness, goodness, handsomeness, niceness, pleasantness, quality, virtue, worth

examples.translation: You are beautiful. (literally: Your body is beauty.)

etymology.value: From the Akan language of Ghana.
